description:
The Pale Reach is the first official expansion for DREDGE - a cosmic horror fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. This content adds a brand new, ice-themed biome that can be experienced at any stage in your playthrough.

In The Pale Reach, youâ€™ll navigate the treacherous ice fields to discover a mystery frozen under the ice. Retrace the steps of the last crew that came before you and unearth a story of bitter betrayal. Find some familiar faces and develop new equipment to navigate the area and profit from its inhabitants.

Key Features

1-3 hours of content playable at any time in your playthrough
Uncover a brand new side-story
Discover 4 new pieces of equipment to catch 11 new fish and crab species
Craft a new boat add-on to smash through the ice
Purchase ice blocks to extend the shelf-life of your most valuable catches
name: DREDGE - The Pale Reach
